project.description:
Following API: -suiteName, -configName, -firmwareVersionMain, suiteName - name of the predefined suite, e.g. Sanity440Lync_basic configName - name of the predefined session config, e.g. Sanity440LyncConfig firmwareVersionMain - name of the firmware file which should be test, e.g. UC430HD_2.0.3.16 1. Before running, put a firmware version to \\isr0214-34401\firmwares (isr0214-34401 = 10.59.0.87) , also it is need to put relevant firmwares for other phones. If tested firmware is UC440HD_3.0.0.65, it is need also to put all other available firmwares: UC430HD_3.0.0.65, UC420HD_3.0.0.65, UC405_3.0.0.65 (note that for 405 ther is no 'HD' in firmware name); 2. Example for run: tclsh AtaExec.tcl -configName Sanity440LyncConfig.ACDev.tcl -suiteName Sanity440Lync_basic.suite -firmwareVersionMain UC440HD_3.0.0.65.img
Should work on 10.59.1.46 - ippAuto

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RegressionType
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Sanity or Full - The name should be Sanity440LyncConfig.ACDev.tcl or Full440LyncConfig.ACDev.tcl
